name: Makuhita

evolution.description: Makuhita can evolve into Hariyama at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 7 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Guts Pokémon. Makuhita is tenacious-it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this Pokémon stores more energy in its body for evolving.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is burned or poisoned, they are not affected by the disadvantage or reduced damage effects. They still take damage at the end of each of their turns.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: When activating a move that has a chance to impose a stat change or inflict a status, this creature instead doubles its move modifier for the damage with no chance of the additional effect.
